Guard Fred:
I`ve heard that an Adventure Guildsman from Gludio sent a great adventurer here. Was that person you?
I know that you were sent by the Adventure Guildsman, but I don`t wnow if I can trust you...
Don`t feel to bad about that - I`m looking out for your back as well as mine.
